backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with core data types for subjects, chapters, questions, user stats, test results, and practice progress, including comparison helpers and text conversion functions.
backend/migration.mo: Implements migration from old data model to new one by adding year fields to questions and converting practice progress to use lastQuestionIndex.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, test IDs and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and main functionality.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: High-level documentation outlining the frontend architecture and directory structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining design tokens, color variables, and dark-mode variants.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry with meta tags, external scripts, and root mounting point for the app.
frontend/index.ts: Type definition file describing structure of user stats data.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, layout, authentication handling, and conditional profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGateC: Admin password entry UI component with validation and state handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity state and handles authentication flow with retry logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Form card allowing users to enter and save their name, with validation and status toasts.
frontend/src/components/contributor/Cani: Displays a timeout warning with options to retry, reload, or return home when the canister is slow.
frontend/src/components/contributor/Cont: Password form for contributor access with login and actor readiness checks; backend action not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: React error boundary that catches errors and renders a global error screen.
Full-page error UI showing an error message with options to reload or go home.
Main app layout with header, navigation, mobile drawer, login button, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobilePag: Responsive layout wrapper that constrains content width and adds padding.
frontend/src/components/practice/Questio: Renders numbered navigation buttons for switching between questions.
frontend/src/components/practice/YearSel: Dialog for selecting an exam year with confirmation actions.
frontend/src/config/liveDeployment.ts: Defines live deployment naming rules and helpers for validating and warning about invalid names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when updated.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Defines a hook that checks contributor access by querying the actor's hasContributorAccess method.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider managing identity loading, login, logout, and status using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeTimer.ts: Implements a timer hook with start, stop, reset, and elapsed time calculations in ms, seconds, and microseconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, chapters, questions, and related data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark theme design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for admin functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterCategorySelect: Displays chapter categories, counts questions, handles PYQ year selection, and navigates to practice routes.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterSelectPage.tsx: Lists chapters for a subject and navigates users to category selection for a chosen chapter.
frontend/src/pages/ContributorPage.tsx: Implements contributor interface for managing chapters and questions with access control, forms, and connection timeout handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays home screen with navigation cards for student mode, rankings, and contributor mode with authentication state handling.
frontend/src/pages/PracticePage.tsx: Runs practice sessions by loading questions, restoring progress, tracking answers and timing, and saving results locally or to backend.
frontend/src/pages/RankingsPage.tsx: Shows leaderboard and user stats with ranking icons and accuracy calculations.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Placeholder results page presenting static performance summaries until backend result retrieval is implemented.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectSelectPage.tsx: Allows users to choose a subject and navigate to chapters using styled selection cards.
frontend/src/types/practice.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for practice session state and local question attempts.
frontend/src/utils/practiceProgressStora: Provides localStorage helpers for saving, loading, and clearing anonymous practice progress keyed by subject, chapter, category, and year.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based ones), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear or retrieve persisted values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state, features, and pending requests for a quiz platform including navigation, resume behavior, syllabus chapters, and year-wise PYQs.
